get.description: Returns all sections with their parameters from openvpn configuration

get.summary: Returns all openvpn configuration sections statuses

external_service.description: Choose from a list of available VPN providers

server_list.description: Choose from a list of available VPN servers

enable_custom.description: Enable custom OpenVPN configuration from file

config.description: OpenVPN configuration file. Warning! This will overwrite your current configuration.

upload_files.description: Upload OpenVPN authentication files, which will be automatically included in configuration

proto.description: A transport protocol used for connection. You can choose here between TCP and UDP

port.description: TCP/UDP port for both local and remote endpoint. Make sure that this port is open in firewall

comp_lzo.description: Use fast LZO compression. With LZO compression your VPN connection will generate less network traffic

auth_mode.description: Authentication mode used to secure data session

tls_cipher.description: Specific cyphers to use. Only 6 can be selected at a time

cipher_custom.description: Specific cyphers to use. Only 6 can be specified at a time

remote.description: IP address or domain name of OpenVPN server

resolv_retry.description: Try to resolve server hostname for x seconds before giving up

keepalive.description: Try to keep a connection alive. Two values are required: ping_interval and ping_restart, e.g. 10 120

local_ip.description: IP address of virtual local network interface

remote_ip.description: IP address of virtual remote network interface

network_ip.description: IP address of remote LAN network

network_mask.description: Subnet mask of remote LAN network

route_ipv6.description: IPv6 address of the remote network

server_ip.description: IP address used for virtual network

server_netmask.description: Subnet mask used for virtual network

server_ipv6.description: IPv6 address used for virtual network

push.description: Push a configuration option back to the client for remote execution

duplicate_cn.description: Allow duplicate certificates. All clients can have same certificates

tls_security.description: Add an additional layer of HMAC authentication on top of the TLS control channel to protect against DoS attacks.

key_direction.description: HMAC authentication key direction value is arbitrary and must be opposite between communicating parties (or omitted entirely

extra.description: Enter any additional options to be added to the OpenVPN configuration.

device_files.description: Choose this option if you want to select certificate files from device. Certificate files can be generated in system/administration/certificates

ca.description: The digital certificate verifies the ownership of a public key by the named subject of the certificate

cert.description: Identify a client or a user, authenticating the client to the server and establishing precisely who they are

key.description: It has been generated for the same purpose as client certificate

userpass.description: File containing usernames and passwords against which the server can authenticate clients. Each username and password pair should be placed on a single line and separated by a space.

crl_verify.description: Revoking a certificate means to invalidate a previously signed certificate so that it can no longer be used for authentication purposes. Upload a .pem revocation file

use_pkcs.description: Use PKCS #12 archive file format to bundle all the members of a chain of trust.

local_ipv6.description: IPv6 address of virtual local network interface

remote_ipv6.description: IPv6 address of virtual remote network interface
